name: HyperSDK
description: Create payment experiences for user to improve coversion and success rate.

script_phases.name: Validate Mandatory Files
script_phases.script:
#!/bin/bash

SKIP_HYPERSDK_VALIDATION=$(launchctl getenv SKIP_HYPERSDK_VALIDATION 2>/dev/null);

# Check if validation should be skipped
if [ "$SKIP_HYPERSDK_VALIDATION" = "true" ] || [ "$SKIP_HYPERSDK_VALIDATION" = "1" ]; then
    echo "⚠️ Skipping HyperSDK validation"
    exit 0
fi

XCFRAMEWORK_PATH="${PODS_ROOT}/HyperSDK/HyperSDK.xcframework"

# Find all .bundle directories in the framework
ARCHITECTURES=("ios-arm64")
MANDATORY_FILES=("release_config.json")

echo "Validating HyperSDK mandatory files..."

for arch in "${ARCHITECTURES[@]}"; do
    FRAMEWORK_PATH="${XCFRAMEWORK_PATH}/${arch}/HyperSDK.framework"
    
    for file in "${MANDATORY_FILES[@]}"; do
        FILE_FOUND=false
        
        # Check in framework root first
        FRAMEWORK_ROOT_PATH="${FRAMEWORK_PATH}/${file}"
        if [ -f "$FRAMEWORK_ROOT_PATH" ]; then
            FILE_FOUND=true
            echo "✅ Found ${file} in framework root (${arch})"
        else
            # Check in all bundle files
            BUNDLES=($(find "$FRAMEWORK_PATH" -name "*.bundle" -type d 2>/dev/null))
            
            for bundle in "${BUNDLES[@]}"; do
                BUNDLE_FILE_PATH="${bundle}/${file}"
                if [ -f "$BUNDLE_FILE_PATH" ]; then
                    FILE_FOUND=true
                    echo "✅ Found ${file} in $(basename "$bundle") (${arch})"
                    break
                fi
            done
        fi
        
        if [ "$FILE_FOUND" = false ]; then
            echo "❌ ERROR: Required files are missing in HyperSDK.xcframework"
            echo "⚠️ Please check if your have added the post_install script and the MerchantConfig file"
            exit 1
        fi
    done
done

echo "✅ HyperSDK properly configured"
